name: The Inscrutable Composer
description:
Help the inscrutable composer Schnailpin compose their Magnum Opus!

  • Skip dialogue with <Space>
  • Play notes with Keyboard Numbers 1-6
  • Select buttons with Arrow Keys / Space, or by clicking.

Credits:

  • https://wavbvkery.com/dice-rolling-sound/
  • https://orangefreesounds.com/forest-ambience/
  • All other sounds recorded by Sakura Magika
  • Schnailpin by my friend, Nessie
  • All other art, writing, coding, and design by Sakura Magika
